contentrichtext.text: {{Use British (Oxford) English|date=December 2011}} '''ISO 4''' is an [[international standard]] which defines a uniform system for the abbreviation of serial titles.<ref>{{cite web| title=LTWA| accessdate= 2010-09-19 | url= http://www.issn.org/2-22660-LTWA.php}}</ref> The [[International Standard Serial Number#Code assignment|ISSN International Centre]], which the [[International Organization for Standardization]] (ISO) has appointed as the [[registration authority]] for ISO 4, maintains the "List of Title Word Abbreviations", which are standard abbreviations for words commonly found in serial titles. == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.issn.org/2-22661-LTWA-online.php List of Title Word Abbreviations] {{ISO standards}} [[Category:ISO standards|#00004]] {{Standard-stub}}
